column1: Kata Robata////No two ways about it
column4: but at least the food we got was very good. The standouts were the Caribbean roll with lobster
column6: and the tropical spicy tuna with mango and wasabi vinaigrette. We also tried a Texas hamachi which supposedly had salmon
column9: but Â the rolls were so tiny I didn't really believe they put all that stuff in there. All I could taste was salmon.
